author: Kaelan Deese
title: Chicago mayor defends getting a haircut amid coronavirus
description: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot (D) defended a haircut she received this weekend despite barbershops and salons being closed due to stay-at-home state mandates....
content:
Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot (D) defended a haircut she received this weekend despite barbershops and salons being closed due to stay-at-home state mandates.
The mayor was criticized for her actions after previously saying, "Getting your roots done is not es… [+1174 chars]
